string.id: dedicated to Carlos Gustavo Cecyn Lundgren

stringtable.string: dedicated to Carlos Gustavo Cecyn Lundgren
You will need a Internet connection to perform the SP - Simple Patch.
If a firewall is installed, it should permit ccvotagus_ca2_spa - spa, Simple Patch Applier - to connect to the Internet.
Current just only option is to Start.
Installation will be done under C:\\Program Files\\ or similar Program Files folder of your Windows machine
within subfolder ca2\\stage and it may be hard coded as so due Windows Registry access policy.
